def.dt: :using care He is a careful driver. You can never be too careful about these things. Be careful! The stove is hot! They are very careful with their money. [=they only spend what they can afford] She was careful of their feelings. The police were careful to leave the room exactly as they found it. see also (be) careful what you wish for at wish
:made, done, or said with care Police made a careful examination of the scene. We kept careful [=meticulous] records of the project. They produced a careful study of the building.

utxt.vi: She carefully picked up the vase.
